metadata.title: CVE-2017-12434 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a missing NULL check vulnerability was found in thefunction ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allows attackers to cause adenial of service (assertion failure) in DestroyImageInfo in image.c.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
